headline: AuditBoard Appoints Raul Villar Jr. as Chief Executive Officer
summary: AuditBoard, the leading AI-powered global platform for connected risk transforming audit, risk, and compliance, today announced the appointment of Raul Villar Jr., former Chief Executive Officer of Paycor, as its new CEO. Villar brings a proven track record of driving significant growth and innovation in the SaaS industry, making him an ideal leader to guide AuditBoard through its next phase of expansion and market leadership.

headline: U.S. Small Business Employment Holds Steady Through First Half of 2025
summary: ROCHESTER, N.Y., July 01, 2025--The small business labor market has remained stable with minimal changes observed through the first half of 2025, according to the Paychex Small Business Employment Watch. The pace of job growth in U.S. businesses with fewer than 50 employees has fluctuated less than half a percentage point over the last six months, reporting a 99.65 index level for June.
